text: Just a comment on McElreaths Book "Statistical Rethinking": There is a supplementary ebook available by Solomon Kurz, translating the code into the brms/tidyverse framework: <https://bookdown.org/content/4857/>

attachments.title: Statistical rethinking with brms, ggplot2, and the tidyverse: Second edition
attachments.text: This book is an attempt to re-express the code in the second edition of McElreath’s textbook, ‘Statistical rethinking.’ His models are re-fit in brms, plots are redone with ggplot2, and the general data wrangling code predominantly follows the tidyverse style.
attachments.fallback: Statistical rethinking with brms, ggplot2, and the tidyverse: Second edition

text:
Hi <!channel>! :blush:

We are all a bit curious about who you are, and especially about the perks of online workshops like this one when it comes to diversity and accessibility. To look into that a bit, we've made a short anonymous poll. No private information is stored, and it would be super helpful for us if you could quickly answer 5 short questions here : <https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScdxCjAvDA_Ft-FladsG2b_chJe2a1lyhRTb29pAvjoxr-u3Q/viewform?usp=sf_linkHi>

To those of you who already replied to the first version of the survey: we kindly ask you to do this again. We had to switch platforms as we should use "free" services for "free" workshops :wink:

text: Great to see the positive comments, I am excited to start my workshop day now -- thanks to the organizers for making the recordings available so quickly, that makes it much more accessible for people on the west coast of the US!

text: Hi! Apart from the FAQ, would it be possible to leave this Slack channel open for at least one week? I missed today the second part of the workshop, and I will probably miss the second day. During the first part, I found all the questions very interesting and helpful, so I would like to have the opportunity to check all of them carefully when I watch the recorded videos. Thank you in advance! And thank you for making this workshop available to everybody!
